conversations.message: Hi, I’d like more details about the products.
Of course, Alex! Which type of products would you like more information about? We have phones, laptops, and accessories.
I’m especially interested in the phones.
Perfect, our phones are Apple models, including the latest iPhone versions. Would you like to know the prices, specifications, or stock availability?
First of all, the prices.
iPhone prices range between 12,000 and 25,000 MDL, depending on the model and storage capacity. Would you like me to give you concrete examples for the most popular models?
Yes, please.
For example, the iPhone 15 starts at 19,500 MDL for the 128 GB version. The Pro Max model starts at 24,500 MDL.
And what warranty do the products come with?
All products come with an official 12-month warranty. In addition, we offer the option to extend the warranty up to 24 months.
Great, and how long does delivery take?
If the product is in stock, delivery in Chișinău is the same day, and in the rest of the country within 1–2 working days.
Thank you very much for the information!
My pleasure, Alex! If you’d like, I can help you place the order right now.
Hello, I’d like to know if you offer car maintenance services.
Hello, Cristina! Yes, we provide full car maintenance services: oil changes, technical inspections, and mechanical repairs.
Great. What kind of technical inspections do you do?
We check the braking system, suspension, battery, filters, fluids, and tires. In addition, we provide full computerized diagnostics.
And how long does a standard inspection take?
A full inspection takes about 60–90 minutes, depending on the car’s condition.
If repairs are needed, how do you proceed?
After diagnostics, we send you a detailed report with recommendations and estimated costs. Repairs are done only after we receive your approval.
Very clear, thank you for the details!
You’re welcome, Cristina! Would you like me to also give you information about our periodic maintenance packages?
Hi! I’m looking for web design services for my company.
Hello, Diana! Excellent, we provide complete web design and development services. What type of website would you like to create?
I need an e-commerce site for our products.
Perfect! For e-commerce, we offer modern platforms with online payments, stock management, and an admin panel. Approximately how many products do you have?
Around 200 products in several categories.
Very good! For 200 products, we recommend a robust platform with advanced filtering and SEO optimization. Would you also like integration with your existing systems?
Yes, including with invoicing and accounting systems.
Excellent! We can integrate with popular invoicing systems. By when would you like the project to be completed?
Hi! I’m interested in your programming courses.
Hello, Bogdan! We have courses for all levels: beginner, intermediate, and advanced. Which programming language are you interested in?
JavaScript and React for frontend development.
Excellent choice! Our JavaScript + React course lasts 4 months and includes practical projects. Do you have any prior programming experience?
I have some experience with basic HTML and CSS.
Perfect! With an HTML/CSS foundation, you can start directly with the JavaScript fundamentals module. We also provide individual mentoring sessions.
Sounds very good! What is the price for the full course?
The full course costs 8,500 MDL, but you can pay in monthly installments of 2,200 MDL. The first lesson is free!
